group_1.textRight: Yeah...
Back when I was on the track team at my old@school,
One of the other members got violent before an@important competition.
In the end, the whole team got suspended,@and we were pulled from the tournament.
It was a huge mess.
But it all changed when I met him.
Yep.
I used my wish so that we'd be allowed to@compete again.
I still remember how overjoyed I was in that@moment.
I was so excited to be able to beat my personal@best...
...In the tournament I'd been waiting for.
Until I realized...thanks to the power of being a@Magical Girl...
My physical abilities increased.
If I ran as fast as possible, I'd get an inhumanly@good time.
So I couldn't exactly put in my maximum effort@anymore...
I thought I could get over it all during my@infiltration mission in Kamihama,
But I didn't.
Even though I knew I'd be dissatisfied, I joined@the track team anyway.
I guess it's the only thing for me, after all.

group_1.textLeft: The sense of accomplishment that track gave you...
Are you hoping to find something like that again...?

group_1.textRight: Mm-hm...

group_1.textLeft: Then it's not simply a matter of setting a record@time.

group_1.textRight: Yuna!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Sakuya. We can continue after we defeat@this Witch.

group_1.textRight: Right!
